summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Tesseract CRM landing page. All features working perfectly including hero section, language toggle, navigation, all sections (problems, solutions, services, ROI), GHL form integration, mobile responsiveness, and scroll animations.
passed_tests: Hero section renders with title, subtitle and CTA buttons
Navigation links scroll to correct sections
Services section displays 3 service cards with features
All CTA buttons link to booking URL (https://link.tesseractcrm.com/widget/booking/VuCHnV26sXlp8qy9DiVG)
Footer renders with quick links and contact info
Glassmorphism design elements present (16 glass-card elements)
All sections properly structured with data-testids
